object4d

Class Object4D

  • java.lang.Object
    • object4d.Object4D

  • public class Object4D
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object in the 4 dimensional-hyperspace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Object4D(Object4D obj4d)
      Initialize 4D object with name, points and connections copied from another 4D object.
      Object4D(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<Point> inputPoints, java.util.ArrayList<Connection> inputConnections)
      Initialize 4D object with name, points and connections.

      Projects a set of 4D vectors down to 2D.
      void removePointOfIndex(int index)
      Removes the point with the index from the points of the 4D object, removes all connections which contain the point and shifts all other connections.
      void rotate(java.lang.String around, double theta)
      Rotates a set of 4d vectors.
      Object4D rotateToCoord(Object4D coord)
      Rotates the 4D object by calculating the rotational difference between a rotated coordinate-system and a normalized coordinate-system.

      Set's the name of the 4D object.

      • Object4D

        public Object4D(java.lang.String name,
                java.util.ArrayList<Point> inputPoints,
                java.util.ArrayList<Connection> inputConnections)
        Initialize 4D object with name, points and connections.
        Parameters:
        name - name for the 4D object
        inputPoints - set of points in the 4D object
        inputConnections - set of connections in the 4D object

      • Object4D

        public Object4D(Object4D obj4d)
        Initialize 4D object with name, points and connections copied from another 4D object.
        Parameters:
        obj4d - 4D object to be copied

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public void rotate(java.lang.String around,
                   double theta)
        Rotates a set of 4d vectors.
        Parameters:
        around - Around what it rotates the vector
        theta - Angle by how much the vector is rotated

      • project

        public Vector2D[] project(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                          ProjectionHandler ph)
        Projects a set of 4D vectors down to 2D.
        Parameters:
        canvas - canvas to be drawn on
        ph - projectionhandler for further passing
        Returns:
        projected set of vector's

      • rotateToCoord

        public Object4D rotateToCoord(Object4D coord)
        Rotates the 4D object by calculating the rotational difference between a rotated coordinate-system and a normalized coordinate-system. These differences are then applied to the 4D object.
        Parameters:
        coord - reference to the coordinate system which this 4D object should be rotated to
        Returns:
        rotated 4D object

      • removePointOfIndex

        public void removePointOfIndex(int index)
        Removes the point with the index from the points of the 4D object, removes all connections which contain the point and shifts all other connections.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the point to be removed

      • testAndRemoveConnection

        public void testAndRemoveConnection(int indexConnection,
                                    int indexPoint)
        Tests if the point is contained in the connection and remove if so.
        Parameters:
        indexConnection - index of the connection to be tested
        indexPoint - index of the point

      • getPoints

        public java.util.ArrayList<Point> getPoints()
        Returns:
        points of the 4D object
